options.bartering: Bartering: Here you can exchange something: give & take.
options.sharing: Sharing: Here you can share material (tools, books, etc.) and immaterial (time, knowledge, ideas) matters.
options.lending: Lending: Here you can borrow something (contributions towards costs).
options.renting: Renting: Here you can rent something.
options.gifting: Gifting: Here you can give and receive.
options.rebuying_reselling: Rebuy & Resell: Here you can get and leave things that are not needed anymore. Second-hand.
options.cousing: Co-Use: Here you can use (some)things with others.
options.diy_and_dit: Do It Yourself & Together: Here you can produce or repair, upcycle or downcycle something by yourself or together with others.
options.buying_and_selling: Buy & Sell: Here you can buy and sell things.
